title: Immersive_Tourist_Flow_Gateways schema
description: Schema for one project entry in the Immersive_Tourist_Flow_Gateways dataset.

schema_version.description: Version tag of the schema used for this record.

project_id.description: Ascending internal identifier in the form ITFG_0001, ITFG_0002, … (prefix ITFG_ plus four digits).

project_name.description: Official or commonly used project name.

short_description.description: 1–3 sentence description of the project’s purpose and character.

country.description: Country where the project is located.

region.description: Region, state or province of the project.

location_notes.description: City, site, park, island or other location details.

gateway_type.description: High-level spatial gateway type for the project.

project_goal.description: Primary and secondary goals of the project in terms of flow and behaviour.

methods_used.description: Techniques used to navigate or modulate tourist flows.

media_format.description: Immersive media formats used in the project.

year_opened_or_announced.description: Year in which the project was opened to the public or officially announced.

producer_operating_entity.description: Main producing or operating entity (organisation, agency, operator).

director_lead_creator.description: Name of the director or lead creator, if documented.

creative_studio.description: Primary creative studio or design lead, if applicable.

technical_partners.description: Key technical partners (e.g. dome integrators, XR teams).

budget_currency.description: Currency code for the budget (preferably ISO 4217).

budget_amount_estimate.description: Estimated budget of the project, if documented.

visitor_capacity_per_hour.description: Estimated or documented maximum visitor throughput per hour.

annual_visitors_estimate.description: Estimated or documented annual number of visitors for the gateway system.

duration_min.description: Typical duration of a single immersive experience in minutes.

sustainability_context.description: Context for ecological and sustainability-related goals.

standards_certifications.description: Sustainability standards or certifications associated with the project (e.g. LEED).

notes.description: Additional notes on sustainability framing and impact.

measurable_effects.description: Quantitative or semi-quantitative indicators of project impact.

traffic_reduction_sensitive_zones_pct.description: Percentage reduction in visitor traffic to sensitive zones, if measured.

increase_alt_attractions_pct.description: Percentage increase in use of alternative attractions, if measured.

timeslot_redistribution_notes.description: Description or metrics of redistribution across timeslots, if available.

behaviour_compliance_rate_pct.description: Compliance rate with desired behaviours (e.g. rules, codes), in percent.

awareness_uplift_metric.description: Metric and value for awareness/knowledge uplift (e.g. survey scale), if documented.

substitution_rate_pct.description: Percentage of visitors who choose immersive substitution instead of visiting a fragile site.

measurement_methods_used.description: Empirical methods used to measure impact and effectiveness.

effectiveness_studies_available.description: Indicates whether any formal effectiveness or evaluation study exists.

effectiveness_studies_refs.description: References to scientific or evaluation studies (DOIs, titles, reports).

reference_urls.description: List of non-AI sources used for this entry (official pages, papers, reports, news).

notes.description: Free-form notes and context that do not fit other fields.

date_added.description: UTC timestamp when the project was first added to the dataset.

date_last_verified.description: UTC timestamp when the entry was last checked against its sources.

source_last_checked.description: Short note or URL of the most recently checked primary source.

commissioning_authority.description: Name of the commissioning authority, public body, or client institution.

commissioning_authority_manager.description: Name or title of the responsible manager/contact person at the commissioning authority, if documented.
